info.title: start mining production with industry leaders
info.subTitle: We make industrial mining accessible to all. You get access to the latest and most advanced technologies in the industry provided by the leading company.

steps.title: Three simple steps for startup of mining
steps.cardTitle: What is the price of our capacities?

about.text: Kekmining is a modern approach, the most innovative systems and the maximum ease of use. Now speaking about mining, you should not think about buying and setting up expensive equipment, it's enough to choose the necessary speed, to distribute assets and get the maximum income.

advantages.text1: Since 2014, our company has been continuously growing and bringing constant income to customers.
advantages.text2: In 2014 it was a small unit in Kiev, now we are aimed at the whole world!
advantages.text4: We adhere to an open policy of work. Honesty, dignity, an agreement without subtext. No hidden commissions and compensation. The withdrawal is at any time.
advantages.titleSlider: What do people think of us?

any.alert: Change of wallet address blocks withdrawals for a period of 2 weeks after confirmation, for security reasons
